doctor.name: Dr. Hasan Habibur Rahman
doctor.specialty: Pain, Arthritis, Paralysis, Sports Injury & Physical Medicine Specialist
doctor.workplace: Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn & Plastic Surgery
doctor.info: Dr. Hasan Habibur Rahman is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Physical Medicine). He is a Assistant Professor, Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation at Sheikh Hasina National Institute of Burn & Plastic Surgery. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Hasan Habibur Rahman at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 9am to 5pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: Shimla Tower, Thana Mor, Hospital Road, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Monjurul Momin Khan
doctor.specialty: Pain, Arthritis, Paralysis, Sports Injury & Physical Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Monjurul Momin Khan is a Physical Medicine Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Physical Medicine). He is a Assistant Professor, Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation at Pabna Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Monjurul Momin Khan at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 3pm to 7pm (Only Sunday).

chamber.address: Shimla Tower, Thana Mor, Hospital Road, Pabna

doctor.info: Dr. Monzur Ahmed is a Physical Medicine Doctor in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Physical Medicine). He is working as a Pain, Paralysis, Sports Injury & Physical Medicine Specialist doctor in Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Kimia Diagnostic Center, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Monzur Ahmed at Kimia Diagnostic Center, Pabna is Every Friday (Call for time).
